title: EASIEST $4,037 Amazon KDP Low Content Niche with Publisher Rocket | Passive Income

tactics.name: keyword_search_analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket's keyword search to identify niches with low competition and high earnings potential
steps: Open Publisher Rocket and navigate to keyword search
Analyze metrics like competitors, average price, and monthly earnings
Check BSR and review count thresholds
caveats: When niche metrics fail to align with earnings potential
source_quotes: click on keyword search and type in a keyword let's take for example 5 minutes journal

heuristics.name: low_review_threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with low competition
source_quotes: average monthly earnings shows us the amount of money we can earn in a month

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket is a one-time paid tool with free lifetime updates
source_quotes: you only have to pay a one-time 97 updates are from then on forever for free

niche_patterns.description: Target time-sensitive productivity niches with low competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines specific identity (journaling) with problem-solving (time management) and constraint (short duration)
source_quotes: average page this bar shows us how many average pages a book has in this niche number of competitors is obvious and the lower this number this easier it will be for you to succeed in this niche
